title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket  for "Imperialism and Social Class" by Joseph Schumpeter", 1955
medium: Lithography in purple, yellow, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on ver vertically in black ink at lower left in script: lustig
Across the top in yellow, black and white ink: 2 [yellow]/ essays by JOSEPH SCHUMPETER [black]/ IMPERIALISM [vertically]/ Social Classes [white]
Across the bottom in white and black ink: MERIDIAN BOOKS [white] published by The Noonday Press/ M4 $1.25 [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a purple background. The title, author and publisher are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name, synopsis and reviews of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, "Bookjacket  for "Imperialism and Social Class" by Joseph Schumpeter", 1955.
1955. Lithography in purple, yellow, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-176.
